channel.title: Error
channel.description:
This happens somtimes
[code=javascript] Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at client.<init>(client.java:9532) at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:44) at server.run(server.java:177) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
Anyone know of a fix?

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Limit101 Limit101
item.description:
@Limit101 wrote:

This happens somtimes

Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space
        at client.<init>(client.java:9532)
        at PlayerHandler.newPlayerClient(PlayerHandler.java:44)
        at server.run(server.java:177)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Anyone know of a fix?
